name: Bicycle in a Tornado
description:
Controls

Arrow Keys, WASD, or Numpad to move the bicycle.

Collect the pineapples! Avoid the knives!

Programming, Art, Design - nuzcraft

Wind Sound: Created by Jonathan Shaw (InspectorJ): https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/376415/

Special Thanks to Crystal Bit for their open source Godot game template - 

https://github.com/crystal-bit/godot-game-template
